casebody.data:
Third Department,

December, 1963

(December 16, 1963) ** Francis M. Dunphy, an Infant, by Althea Rosenblum, His Guardian ad Litem, et al., Respondents, v. Jack Bolton, Appellant.

Not published with other decisions of Dec., 1963, 20 A D 2d 582.— [Rep.

Order affirmed, with $10 costs to plaintiffs-respondents. Although there may possibly be a *854distinction in principle between the ease of the infant and that of the adult no such distinction is argued or suggested by appellants. Bergan, P. J., Gibson, Herlihy and Reynolds, JJ., concur.
